com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Class YRCButtonBindingData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCBaseBindingData
      • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCButtonBindingData

  • public class YRCButtonBindingData
extends YRCBaseBindingData
    Instances of this class provide binding and name information about controls. The controls which can use this binding data object are: Button, Radio, CheckBox.

    Example Code: 
     //Create a binding object that has to be associated with a control.
 YRCButtonBindingData oButtonBindingData = new YRCButtonBindingData();
 
 //Set the name of the control. The control name should be unique.
 oButtonBindingData.setName("chkAccrossEnterprice");
 
 oButtonBindingData.setSourceBinding("/Order/@IsAccrossEnterprice");
 
 //Set the target binding. By setting the target binding we can use the value of the button
 //to populate the entries in the corresponding model.
 oButtonBindingData.setTargetBinding("/Order/@IsAccrossEnterprice");
 
 //Set the checked binding, this is the value which gets set into the xml, if the control is checked. 
 oButtonBindingData.setCheckedBinding("Y");
 
 //Set the unchecked binding, this is the value which gets set into the xml, if the control is unchecked. 
 oButtonBindingData.setUnCheckedBinding("N");
 
 //Finally set the binding data on the control. The key used is: YRCConstants.YRC_BUTTON_BINDING_DEFINATION
 chkAccrossEnterprice.setData(YRCConstants.YRC_BUTTON_BINDING_DEFINATION,oButtonBindingData);

      • getActionId

        public java.lang.String getActionId()

      • setActionId

        public void setActionId(java.lang.String actionId)
        The actionId associated with the control. The actionId indicates the action which is invoked when the control is selected. The actionId can be set only on Button controls, if set for other controls it is ignored. The actionId is used to display the Hot key information on the button.
        See Also:
        setActionHandlerEnabled(boolean)

      • setActionHandlerEnabled

        public void setActionHandlerEnabled(boolean isActionHandlerEnabled)
        Method to indicate that a action handler needs to be created for the control. If the parameter is set to true, a action handler will be created and and the action will be fired on selection of the control. The actionId must be set. By default, the action handler is not enabled and is not created.
        See Also:
        setActionId(String)

      • isActionHandlerEnabled

        public boolean isActionHandlerEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the action has to be handled internally.
        See Also:
        setActionHandlerEnabled(boolean)

      • setKey

        public void setKey(java.lang.String key)
        The resource bundle key used to display the text on the control. If the key is set then, the text on the control is displayed in association with the displaytextBinding and the key.

        public java.lang.String getImageServerConfigName()

      • setServerImageConfiguration

        public void setServerImageConfiguration(java.lang.String imageServerConfigName)
        Method to specify the image server configuration to fetch and display image on the Label. It also specifies that the Label is actually a image displayer and the image is to fetched from the image server. When model is set then the label is updated with the image fetched from the server instead of the text.
        Parameters:
        imageServerConfigName -

      • isDBLocalized

        public boolean isDBLocalized()
        Returns:
        true if the button display text has to be localized using database, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setDBLocalized(boolean)

      • setDBLocalized

        public void setDBLocalized(boolean isDBLocalized)
        Boolean to populate the Button display text using the db localizd string.
        Parameters:
        isDBLocalized - Pass true if the Button has to be populated using db localized string. By default it is set to false.
        See Also:
        YRCPlatformUI.getDBString(String)

      • setServerImageBinding

        public void setServerImageBinding(boolean isServerImageBinding)
        Method to specify that the source binding needs to fetch and display image on the Button from the provided URL. When model is set then the button is updated with the image fetched from the server instead of the text. Applications can use this method specifically to get images from an external server.
        If setServerImageConfiguration(String) is used then this boolean is implicitly set to true.
        Parameters:
        isServerImageBinding - True to indicate that image is fetched from a server.
